item.title: Sources: U-M targeting Utes legend Whittingham
item.description: Utah coach Kyle Whittingham has emerged as the focus of Michigan's coaching search, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Garrett eyes sack record vs. 'legendary' Rodgers
item.description: Defensive end Myles Garrett says it will be "special" to set the NFL's single-season sack record against "legendary" quarterback Aaron Rodgers when th...

item.title: Pats down 5 starters, but Henderson might play
item.description: The Patriots will be without five starters against the Jets, but there's still a chance rookie running back TreVeyon Henderson is available as he prog...

item.title: Sources: AD to miss a few games with groin strain
item.description: Mavericks star Anthony Davis has sustained a minor groin strain and is likely to miss a few games, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

item.title: Longhorns' leading rusher Wisner to enter portal
item.description: Texas' leading rusher Quintrevion Wisner plans to enter the NCAA transfer portal, the running back's agent Grayson Sheena of AiC Sports told ESPN.
